video.title: Crime Secrets of...
video.synopsis: Professional thieves and the authorities who stop them reveal the latest tactics in petty crime, as well as new defensive measures to thwart it.

episodes.synopsis: In the perpetual cat-and-mouse game between shops and robbers, both sides employ cunning, surprising techniques to outwit the other.
episodes.title: Shoplifters 1

episodes.synopsis: Shoplifters and those determined to catch them share the latest tricks of the trade, as the recession has altered the profile of the typical thief.
episodes.title: Shoplifters 2

episodes.synopsis: A special police task force in one town attempts to track down and lock up the area's top 10 shoplifters before the Christmas shopping season.
episodes.title: Shoplifters 3

episodes.synopsis: It's summer 2012, and as the recession continues and the Olympic games loom, the battle between cops and robbers gathers pace across Britain.
episodes.title: Pickpockets 1

episodes.synopsis: As a new crime wave hits London above and below ground, police squads are sent in to track down the latest spate of pickpockets striking the city.
episodes.title: Pickpockets 2

episodes.synopsis: With pickpocket gangs targeting unsuspecting tourists on Spain's beaches and busy streets, a stalwart group fights back against the criminals.
episodes.title: Secrets of Pickpockets Abroad

episodes.synopsis: While the police try to stop street scams, "scam baiters" aim to waste online scammers' time and resources to deter them from targeting others.
episodes.title: Secrets of Scammers
